data.title: Alphabet's Google Investing in, and Teaming With, ADT
data.text: The tech titan will take a 6.6% equity stake in the home-security specialist.

data.title: Google owner Alphabet issues record $10 billion bond at lowest-ever price
data.text: Alphabet Inc borrowed $10 billion in the investment-grade corporate debt market on Monday, the Google parent's largest ever bond issue, which it secured at its lowest-ever cost of financing.

data.title: Google Pay Partners With Six More Banks With Digital Banking On The Rise
data.text: Google says it will offer digital checking and savings accounts to users in the U.S. starting in 2021.

data.title: What ADT’s New Partnership With Google Is All About
data.text: ADT Inc. (NYSE: ADT) saw a massive gain on Monday after the firm announced a partnership with Google to create the next generation of smart home security.

data.title: Google buys 6.6% stake in ADT home security to integrate with Nest products
data.text: Yahoo Finance's Dan Howley reports on Google's $450 million stake in ADT.

data.title: Google signs up six more partners for its digital banking platform coming to Google Pay
data.text: Google is expanding its plans to offer digital banking services in the U.S. The company announced today it’s partnering with half a dozen more banks to offer digital checking and savings accounts to Google Pay users in the U.S.

data.title: The 4a and 5 will be Google’s first 5G-enabled Pixels
data.text: Surprise. The latest version of Google’s budget Pixel device will be one of the first two to get its next-gen technology. It’s an odd strategy, to be sure, but sometimes roadmaps work out like that, I guess.

data.title: Google unveils the $350 Pixel 4A, a budget phone amid an economic downturn
data.text: The launch was delayed for months and comes as the search giant faces shake ups in its smartphone division.

data.title: Google Pixel 4A Review: At $350, a Win for Those on a Budget
data.text: Yes, you can now pay less than $399 for a smartphone — and it won’t stink.

data.title: Google just announced a new Android phone to challenge the iPhone SE, and it only costs $350
data.text: If you're shopping for a new phone right now and don't want to spend more than $400, I think you should either pick the Pixel 4a or the iPhone SE. But they're totally different phones, so here's what you need to know.

data.title: ADT Stock Soars On Google Investment To Create Smarter Home
data.text:
ADT leapt to a record high on Monday after Alphabet's Google said it would invest in and partner with the home-security provider.
The post ADT Stock Soars On Google Investment To Create Smarter Home appeared first on Investor's Business Daily.

data.title: Why You Should Buy the Post-Earnings Dip in Alphabet
data.text: Google stock fell despite a strong earnings report and strength elsewhere in Big Tech names. But broader trends mean Alphabet will catch up.

data.title: ADT stock soars 65% after $450 million Google investment
data.text: Shares of home security business ADT rose sharply on Monday after the company announced a $450 million investment from Google.

data.title: ADT Surges On Google Partnership To Create Smart Home Security Offering
data.text: ADT (NYSE: ADT) shares are trading higher on Monday after the company announced entering into a long-term partnership with Alphabet Inc.

data.title: UPDATE: ADT shares soar 80% premarket on news of venture with Google to create smart home security product
data.text: Shares of residential and commercial security provider ADT Inc. ADT, -0.46% soared 80% in the premarket trade Monday, after the company announced a new venture with Alphabet Inc.

data.title: Google partners with ADT on security for smart homes
data.text: The partnership includes not only new security products, but a 6.6% equity investment in ADT.

data.title: Google to invest $450 million to acquire a 6.6% stake in ADT
data.text: Home security firm ADT said on Monday Alphabet's Google would invest $450 million to acquire 6.6% stake in the company.

data.title: Google to invest $450M in smart home security solutions provider ADT
data.text: Google is investing $450 million in ADT to acquire a 6.6% stake in the Florida-headquartered firm that provides security and smart home solutions, the two said today. As part of the long-term investment, the two companies will work on next generation smart home security offerings, they said.

data.title: ADT shares soar 38% premarket on news of venture with Google to create smart home security product
data.text: Shares of residential and commercial security provider ADT Inc. ADT, -0.46% soared 38% in the premarket trade Monday, after the company announced a new venture with Alphabet Inc.

data.title: ADT and Google Partner To Create Leading Smart Home Security Offering
data.text: BOCA RATON, Fla., Aug.  03, 2020  (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- ADT (NYSE:  ADT ), a leading provider of security and smart home solutions, and Google today announced they are entering into a long-term partnership to create the next generation of smart home security offerings. The partnership will combine Nest’s award-winning hardware and services, powered by Google’s machine learning technology, with ADT’s installation, service and professional monitoring network to create a more helpful smart home and integrated experience for customers across the United States.

data.title: After Big Tech's grilling on Capitol Hill, Brussels could be next
data.text: American lawmakers fear current antitrust laws are not fit for the digital economy. This is a concern also shared by many lawmakers in Europe.
